title: Our Programs
subtitle: Explore our programs and find your place on the mat

programs.title: Beginner
programs.description: Start your Jiu-Jitsu journey with a solid base. We keep it clear and doable for everyone.

programs.title: Intermediate
programs.description: Level up your technique and add more tools. Classes built for real progress.

programs.title: Advanced
programs.description: Details, strategy, and complex situations. For when you're ready to go deeper.

programs.title: Competition
programs.description: Get competition-ready: intensity, rules, and live rolling. Built for athletes who compete.

programs.title: Baby, Kids & Teen
programs.description: Fun, discipline, and coordination for kids and teens. Learning that sticks.

programs.title: Executive (35+)
programs.description: For adults who want to train smart: health, technique, and a pace that works for you.

programs.title: NO GI
programs.description: No-gi grappling focused on movement and submissions. Adapt and flow.

programs.title: Women's
programs.description: A space for women: confidence, self-defense, and performance on the mat.

programs.title: Night Owl
programs.description: Late classes for those who train after dark. Same quality, different schedule.

programs.title: Private Lessons
programs.description: One-on-one time to speed up your learning or work on specific goals with a dedicated professor.

programs.title: Open mat
programs.description: Your time on the mat. Drill, experiment, and build your game your way.
